overview: Buddy Guy & Band appearing live on Ohne Filter (German SWR TV) in Baden-Baden, Germany in July 1991. Setlist:  01 - intro (german) by TV deejee  02 - Sweet Home Chicago  03 - Damn Right I've Got The Blues  04 - Mary Had A Little Lamb  05 - Everything's Gonna Be Allright  06 - Things That I Used To Do  07 - She's Been Gone Too Long  08 - There Is Something On Your Mind  09 - Crazy About You
title: Buddy Guy Listen to this Eric
